highlights: Member of the Developer team in Esri Canada's Technical Support department. This includes supporting all Esri development, and mobile products as well as ArcGIS Online for all Canadian customers.
Responsible for meeting quarterly scores for customer satisfaction, on an individual and team levels.
Presented at both Esri DevSummit 2013 and Esri Canada annual conference on adding real-time capabilities to GIS applications.
Member of the Esri Canada blog team.

work.company: Orion Technology, a Division of Rolta Canada Limited
highlights: Participated in the development of a client/server GIS application for field workers that helps manage the workflow of utilities companies (built on ArcObjects and ArcGIS Server platform).
Designed and developed prototype for securing access to ArcGIS Server data.
Designed and developed prototype for using utility networks on OnPoint via ArcGIS Server.
Designed and developed the routing component for OnPoint software with ArcGIS Server backend.
Developed a simple prototype for a workflow that uses ArcGIS Mobile 10

publications.name: Technical Article: How to Draw using XAML in a Silverlight Viewer Add-in
publications.summary: A technical article published by Esri Canada that explains how to build an ArcGIS Server Silverlight Viewer addin that implements a sample for the Silverlight API.

publications.name: Top 10 Resources for ArcGIS API for JavaScript Developers
publications.summary: A helpful guide for new and experienced JavaScript starting with the ArcGIS API for JavaScript.

publications.name: AskDeveloper Podcast
publications.summary: Weekly audio/video podcast for technology & programming enthusiasts, the podcast is in Arabic and targets the Egyptian & Middle Eastern audience.

publications.name: Esri Canada Technical Staff Square Off in First-Ever App Building Contest
publications.summary: Article highlights organizing role in Esri Canada's TechTrek Idol contest.
